title: Permit Application Procedures
content:
Permit Application Procedures

State Regulations
§ 621.3 - General requirements for applications
§ 621.4 - Requirements for specific permit applications
§ 621.5 - Optional preapplication conferences
§ 621.6 - Departmental action on applications
§ 621.7 - Public notice and comment
§ 621.8 - Determination to conduct a public comment hearing or adjudicatory proceeding
§ 621.9 - Settlement conferences
§ 621.10 - Final decisions on applications
§ 621.11 - Applications for permit renewals, reissuances and modifications, including transferring or relinquishing permits

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
